text: The menu is very nice, and I had a hard time not ordering more!! Good and tasty large slices, yummy and crispy dough with loads of topping.

Start with this - it's a pizza joint. Don't walk in expecting anything else. That said, good pizza every time I've been here over the past year, good sandwiches, fair prices, and the kicker - really nice people. Simple fare, but I always leave happy.
Great place. Unique pizza . Love going there when in the beachwood are highly recommend.

Great NY style pizza! Crispy fries and something for everyone with an Israeli twist! The prices are fair for Cleveland kosher.... And there isn't much competition, but food is always delicious.... Next I want to try a wrap!
